articles.title: Between hope and hype for Toyota's 'solid-state' EV batteries - Financial Times
articles.description: Can Japanese carmaker grasp holy grail for next-generation driving which has eluded industry for years?
articles.content:
As carmakers race to develop electric battery-powered cars, they are constantly vying for anything that will give them the edge over rivals.

articles.author: Matt G. Southern
articles.title: Twitter's Google Rankings Plummet Following Actions By Elon Musk - Search Engine Journal
articles.description: Twitter's search visibility on Google fell by 32% in a single day, according to Sistrix, following actions taken by CEO Elon Musk.
articles.content:
According to multiple data analysis firms, Twitter is experiencing a significant decline in visibility on Google.

articles.author: Turner Wright
articles.title: UK government moves forward on bill aimed at empowering authorities to seize crypto - Cointelegraph
articles.description: Lawmakers in the U.K. passed the Financial Services and Markets Bill in June and are now in the final stages of passing the Economic Crime and Corporate Transparency Bill.
articles.content:
Lawmakers in the upper house of the Parliament of the United Kingdom are moving forward with legislation aimed at expanding authorities ability to target cryptocurrencies used for illicit purposes.
